thread.title: Pro Tips that will change your life : theCHIVE
thread.title_full: Pro Tips that will change your life : theCHIVE

title: Pro Tips that will change your life : theCHIVE
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
I’m not a particularly savvy man. I’m still trying to figure out my washing machine. Like, of course I want my clothes to be “extra clean”— why wouldn’t that be the only setting? Also, what do you call the stuff you put on the clothes to clean them? Clothes juice? Laundry sauce? 
I do not have this whole life thing figured out. But the brilliant people over at the LifeProTips subreddit sure do. While I fold my shrunken, pink t-shirts, you guys and gals take a look at some of their best nuggets of advice. 2 GIF 
If you are in line when the polls close, they are legally required to let you vote. skibbydbop ____ 
If someone you know is making an attempt to dress better/improve hygeine/make a better overall effort with their appearance, compliment them. It will encourage them to keep on going with their self improvement journey. simmocar ____ 
If you constantly vent your problems to someone, make sure to also call them when things are going well. Good listeners can sometimes get overwhelmed, and it’s nice to hear positive news. anthson ____ 
If a server or cashier at a restaurant gives you extra of something for no charge, and you are later asked by a manager if that employee was doing their job well, don’t mention that they gave you extra food. It could potentially get them in trouble. TRON17 ____ 
Download Wifi analyzer to determine what channel your router should broadcast its Wifi Signal. Improved my wifi speeds by 22x
